channel.title: CVE Feed for LCDS -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LCDS -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-19002|2024-09-16T20:27:21.831Z -- lcds -- lcds%20laquis%20scada
item.description: LCDS Laquis SCADA prior to version 4.1.0.4150 allows improper control of generation of code when opening a specially crafted project file, which may allow remote code execution, data exfiltration, or cause a system crash.

item.title: CVE-2024-5040|2024-06-04T18:02:51.586Z -- lcds -- laquis%20scada
item.description: There are multiple ways in LCDS LAquis SCADA for an attacker to access locations outside of their own directory.

item.description: There are multiple ways in LCDS LAquis SCADA for an attacker to access locations outside of their own directory.
